name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.
schedule:
第1週 Introduction/ Design thinking
第2週 Type of materials
第3週 Atomic Structure and Bonding
第4週 Crystalline Structure and Imperfections
第5週 Crystallography

第6週 第一次期中考

第7週 Dislocation dynamics
第8週 Strengthening Mechanisms
第9週 Mechanical properties (Plasticity)
第10週 Mechanical properties (Plasticity, Fracture)
第11週 Processes and Properties (Creep, Fatigue)

第12週 第二次期中考

第13週Diffusion in Solid
第14週 Phase diagrams
第15週 Phase Transformations (general overview)
第16週 Phase Transformations of steel

第17週 Summary of course/ Repetition

第18週期末考
scorePolicy:
1st Midterm Exam (25%, Close Book test)
2nd Midterm Exam (25%, Close Book test)
Final Exam (30%, Close Book test)
平時考/點名 (20%)
materials: Materials Science and Engineering, by Ccallister and Rethwisch, 9th ed., SI version, Wiley Pub.
